devote.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
devote.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He devoted his energies to writing films.
devote your time/energy/attention etc to something
She devoted herself full-time to her business.
devote.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In everyday English, people usually say put time/energy etc into something rather than devote time/energy etc to something:
He put a lot of time into the project.
devote.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to use a particular area, period of time, or amount of space for a specific purpose
devote.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The meeting will be devoted to health and safety issues.
